name: Random Access Memories (Viktor)
description:
This is a story-driven weird game containing arcade and puzzle mini-games and featuring questionable game-play mechanics and poorly written dialogs.
It is mostly built around a "hacking" mini game like one could expect from cyberpunk games.
Construct and debug programs to attack computer systems and find out the truth!

Story: After downloading a weird piece of software you are contacted by someone claiming to be an AI telling you that you lost the memories of your previous life...

This game was made with Godot engine and is open source.
